resources.string: Help to fight COVID 19 in Sri Lanka
You can find whether you have encountered COVID 19 positive patient in last 3 weeks.
Please keep your bluetooth turned on whenever you go out
This app does not record your location and only record nearby users around you. Everything stays on your device and will automatically delete after three weeks
We will generate a unique id for you ! Optionally you can provide your mobile number. It will be used to contact you if required
We sent a verification code to your number. Please enter it here to verify the number
Entered code is incorrect ! Please try again
